job.title: Data Scientist - Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (100% Remote)
job.description: What You Will Do:This position supports performing the full systems and software architecture and life cycle for DevSecOps and full stack engineering tasks using Agile methodologies. As an AI / ML Specialist you will be responsible to design, implement, and maintain data architectures and services to be used for AI/ML. Candidate must be team-oriented, self-starting, and innovation-minded to individually and collectively contribute to the design and development of cutting-edge AI and Analytics solutions.Job Duties:â¢Work with functional analysts and product strategist to identify opportunities and leverage data to drive solutions.â¢Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.â¢Develop custom data science models and algorithmsâ¢Work with DevSecOps engineers to create and utilize MLOPS pipelineâ¢Actively seek and perform work, new approaches and elevate the team to higher standardsâ¢Conduct various data wrangling tasks to ensure the highest possible data qualityâ¢Communicate complex tasks in plain English so others can comprehendâ¢Recommend and implement solutions after analyzing business needs to drive for positive outcomesâ¢Facilitate engineering tasks and push for completion of epicsâ¢Develop user stories and define clear and achievable acceptance criteriaâ¢Conduct PRs to critique and encourage engineers to be their bestâ¢Collaborate with other technical leads to handle cross-team dependenciesRequired Skills:â¢Passion â Demonstrated ability to keep pushing for better resultsâ¢Technology â Demonstrated experience using a variety of machine learning techniques and understanding of their real-world advantages and drawbacks. Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts. Experience with deploying models to production, ideally within an AWS ecosystem. Experience with Python (R and Spark a plus).â¢Systems â Demonstrated ability to proactively identify areas of technical improvement to improve efficiency, performance, scalability, security and maintainability of applicationsâ¢Client Management- Ability to become client's trusted advisor and maximize their satisfactionâ¢Expression âAbility to communicate in plain English to disseminate information that others comprehendâ¢Situation â Ability to understand external and internal factors and how they may impact program, client and company and prepare mitigation approachesâ¢Strategy â Ability to learn, listen and plan programs and tasks for the betterment of organizationâ¢Tactical â Ability to implement strategy and deliver measurable business values in iterative incrementsâ¢Entrepreneur â Ability to identify, capture and implement opportunities tied to revenue streamsâ¢Education â Bachelorâs degree (or higher) in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, or related fieldDesired Skills:â¢5+ years of experience implementing data science algorithmsâ¢5+ years of experience with AWSâ¢Leadership experienceâ¢Experience supporting sales and business developmentâ¢Experience using SageMaker, Databricks, MLFlow, or similar environmentâ¢Experience with large scale, high performance enterprise big data application deployment and solution architecture on complex heterogeneous environments in AWSMust Be Eligible to Obtain Government ClearanceDue to federal client requirements, only US Citizens can be considered
